titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make inadmissible past representatives or members of terrorist organizations, and for other purposes.
Preventing Terrorist Entry Act of 2022
Preventing Terrorist Entry Act of 2022

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Preventing Terrorist Entry Act of 2022
This bill bars non-U.S. nationals (aliens under federal law) who are former members or representatives of terrorist organizations from admission into the United States. (Current law bars current members and representatives.)
